item.title: About
item.description: Hey there! I’m a passionate self-taught developer originally from Taiwan, now living in London and working as a software engineer. I mainly focus on backend development using Golang, but occasionally dabble in frontend technologies like React to build complete products and improve cross-functional collaboration and communication, leading to more efficient and effective development processes. I’m also fascinated by devops, where it can automate a lot of things and make life a lot easier.
